sections.heading: Short title.
sections.text: This Act may be cited as the Veterans Advisory Council Act.

sections.heading: Veterans advisory councils.
sections.text:
A veterans advisory council may be
established in each municipality in this State with a population of more than
50,000 inhabitants. Each council shall consist of at least 3 but not more than
10 members appointed by the mayor of the municipality. Membership shall be
voluntary, and members of a council shall not receive any compensation for
their services.
